pullRequest.title: [Admin Portal Revamp] Bot Detection - Email Configuration

commit.message: Email configuration for bot detection alert
Merge branch 'admin_portal_revamp' of https://github.com/wso2/carbon-apimgt into admin-portal-conv-email-config

nodes.bodyText: I think it's not worth having a reducer, just to keep a single state variable (name='email'), Shall we use useState instead? It will make the code cleaner WDYT ? 😃
Shall we use a separate EmptyBox kind of component to show a message when there are no elements ?

Please don't use callback functions? no need to use callbacks with promises, We have used this pattern back then but realize there is no use of passing call back function as an argument to a function which returns a Promise object because addBotDetectionNotifyingEmail function callee have complete freedom to append any number of success (then) and failure (catch) handlers 😃

commit.message: Display Card component when content is empty
